Quality: This Data set is better than the earlier released products but it is not fully validated yet. Before using it in any trend analysis please contact algorithm team lead Dr. Omar Torres ( omar.o.torres@nasa.gov ) for the current known problems and updates.

Abstract:
The OMI science team produces this Level-3 daily global TOMS-Like Total Column Ozone gridded product OMTO3d (1 deg Lat/Lon grids). The OMTO3d product is produced by gridding and averaging only good quality level-2 total column ozone orbital swath data (OMTO3, based on the enhanced TOMS version-8 algorithm) on the 1x1 degree global grids.

The OMTO3d files are stored in the version 5 EOS Hierarchical Data Format (HDF-EOS5). Each file contains daily data from approximately 15 orbits. The maximum file size for the OMTO3d data product is about 0.65 Mbytes.

UseConstraints.Description: The Earth Observing System Data and Information System (EOSDIS) data use policy for NASA data can be accessed at https://earthdata.nasa.gov/earth-observation-data/data-use-policy. For information on how to properly cite and acknowledge data from the NASA GES DISC, refer to https://disc.gsfc.nasa.gov/information/documents?title=data-policy.
